lines.line: Ever felt like the world has forgotten you?
When tears seem to be your only companion.
When life burns everything you've built to the ground.
And you're left standing in the ashes of what once was.
But remember - even in your darkest hour, you have a choice.
You can stay hidden, sheltered from the world.
Or you can prepare to rise again.
To leap toward your dreams with unstoppable determination.
To run boldly through open fields of opportunity.
To escape the flames that tried to consume you.
To stand tall, showing the world your strength.
To reach for what you truly desire.
To find joy in the simple moments again.
To embrace those who lift you up.
To nurture others as you've been nurtured.
Your past doesn't define your future. Your resilience does.

parsed_script.full_script: Ever felt like the world has forgotten you?  When tears seem to be your only companion.  When life burns everything you've built to the ground.  And you're left standing in the ashes of what once was.  But remember - even in your darkest hour, you have a choice.  You can stay hidden, sheltered from the world.  Or you can prepare to rise again.  To leap toward your dreams with unstoppable determination.  To run boldly through open fields of opportunity.  To escape the flames that tried to consume you.  To stand tall, showing the world your strength.  To reach for what you truly desire.  To find joy in the simple moments again.  To embrace those who lift you up.  To find comfort in connection.  To nurture others as you've been nurtured.  Because together, we are stronger.  Your past doesn't define your future. Your resilience does.
